turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a pizza from Pizza Hut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, I'd be happy to help with ordering a pizza! Which Pizza Hut store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Glenmont, MD.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Pizza Huts store 12331 Georgia Ave Silver Spring, MD 20906. Correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a large peperoni pizza with extra cheese. Another large with olives and green pepper.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What type of crust? Normal sauce?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Normal sauce and deep dish.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. So far, we have 2 large pizzas. 1 with extra cheese and pepperoni, The second with olives and green peppers. Normal sauce. Deep dish pizzas. Correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Placing an order for 2 large pizzas. 1 with extra cheese and pepperoni, The second with olives and green peppers. Normal sauce. Deep dish pizzas. The order has been successfully completed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. When will it be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It should be ready for pick-up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it. Thanks alot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome! Enjoy your pizzas!
